name: Angry Caveman
description:
ANGRY CAVEMAN "I woke up today and I want eggs! Unga Bunga!"

Help an angry caveman break those damned eggs of dinosaurs!

It's a cute sling shot game: click and hold a boulder to shot it into a construction built by dinosaur who want to protect his eggs! Click and pan everywhere else to see the map.

Game by: Paweł Jarosz

Music and SFX by: Grey Goon Game Audio

Art: Paweł Jarosz, KenneyNL, Jesse Munguia

Made with Defold
